description: Poor attempt at audio software. Program would prompt multiple errors before launch. It complained of Jack not running, even though Jack worked elsewhere. My experience led to slow performance on a relatively high end laptop.
summary: You will not write 1 bar of music before problems

description:
Since the flatpak version will only run flatpak plguins (VST, LV2, etc), it is unusable. There is not flatpak plugins out there. You cannot use the plugins from the KX Repositories, or anything is installed as a deb, or through any repos.

Since the software comes with no instruments this prevents you from using any instruments.
summary: The flatpak version will only run Flatpak plugins
